pkgmetadata.longdescription: Basu-Dhar Bivariate Geometric Distribution // Computes the joint probability mass function (pmf), the joint cumulative function (cdf), the joint survival function (sf), the correlation coefficient, the covariance, the cross-factorial moment and generate random deviates for the Basu-Dhar bivariate geometric distribution as well the joint probability mass, cumulative and survival function assuming the presence of a cure fraction given by the standard bivariate mixture cure fraction model. The package also computes the estimators based on the method of moments.
